item.title: GTD Practice Survey
item.description: GTD 在最近十年中的都特别火。 我自从高中阶段通过知乎了解到了时间管理，遗憾的是我已经研究生了还在了解 GTD。 我似乎永远都学不会如何 正确的 使用 GTD ，

item.title: About The Mind Of Emacs
item.description: Recently, I am busy with everything. I feel tired and anxious. I’m trying to find a method that can bring about lasting change and make solving my life’s challenges easier and simpler. I am a socialist and I support the free software movement. I used to write some Emacs configurations, but these setups couldn’t address my problems. I’ve fallen into a new trap of doing things just for the sake of doing them.
